The
Amakagame are in essence just huge stomachs. Their bodies are covered in veins, that they use to attach themselves to the cave walls of the
3rd Layer. As they are immobile they need to establish a symbiotic relationship with Neritantans. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details: Since Amakagame are immobile they do not pose much danger for Delvers. They use the stench of Baracocha fruit to lure unsuspecting prey through a hole in the top of their bodies, drawing them near, before swallowing them whole. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops: The parts of an Amakagame are not the most useful. Its
whiskers can be sold to vendors, as they are seen as a delicacy to Orths higher class.
Baracocha fruit can also be found growing around their caves. :hypers:
